data.title: Bloomfield Family Tree
data.text:
Earl Henry of Lancaster

Sex: M

Individual Information

Birth Date: 1281 Christening: Death: 22 September 1345 Burial: Cause of Death:

Events

 Marriage: to Maud de Chaworth, 2 March 1297.

Parents

Father: Earl Edmund Crouchback Mother: Blanche of Artois

Spouses and Children

1. *Maud de Chaworth Marriage: 2 March 1297 Children: 1. Earl Henry of Derby 2. Blanche of Lancaster 3. Maud of Lancaster 4. Joan of Lancaster 5. Isabel of Lancaster 6. Eleanor of Lancaster 7. Mary of Lancaster

Notes General:

Henry was the High Sheriff of Lancashire in 1327 and in 1330 he lost his sight.

Maud of Lancaster

Sex: F

Individual Information

Birth Date: 1310 Christening: Death: 5 May 1377 - Bruisyard Abbey, Suffolk Burial: May 1377 - Bruisyard Abbey, Suffolk Cause of Death:

Events

 Marriage: to Earl William de Burgh.

 Marriage: to Ralph de Ufford.

Parents

Father: Earl Henry of Lancaster Mother: Maud de Chaworth

Spouses and Children

1. *Ralph de Ufford Marriage: Children: 1. Maud de Ufford

Notes General:

On 6 June 1333, Maud's husband was murdered by Sir Richard de Mandeville, John de Logan and others at Le Ford, near the modern Belfast. After his murder, which sparked a civil war in Ireland, Maud fled to England with her infant daughter, who was the suo jure Countess of Ulster, and they lived at the court of King Edward III with the royal family. She married her second husband, Sir Ralph de Ufford, by 8 August 1343.

Notes General:

David I was a 12th-century ruler who was Prince of the Cumbrians (11131124) and later King of the Scots (11241153).
